Order a size smaller because they run big. I kept the shorts because they're comfortable. They're my new private lounging shorts!

评论概述: Great plus size shorts with minimal inner thigh creep!
评论详情: I am so glad I gave these a try!!  I bought 3 pair and now I'm buying 4 more!  I really struggle being tall and plus size with a long torso finding shorts.  I typically have to buy too big, which makes the gusset baggy and weird, or deal with a wedgie in the correct size.  And don't even get me started on inner thigh ride up!These shorts don't do ANY of that!  I was able to wear these HIKING and only occasionally had to adjust the inner thighs!  And for reference I am 5'8", 240, and carry most of mt fat around my lower torso, rump, and inner thighs.  I don't know how they did it... there's a pretty heavy lining fabric and a very sturdy sewn down hem, but the fabric is slick, like fake satin (but not shiny)..anyway, somehow all of that seems to converge in them not being prone to riding up.Besides that the cut is super cute, really flattering.  The pockets are functional without adding bulk AND are sewn to the lining so don't wad up or wrinkle when washed!!!  I was really surprised at how well designed these are for the price!!  Highly recommend!
I like the fit of these shorts and the flower pattern gives them a fun summer look.  I do not like the fact that the white material is see through.  I am going to try to make them work somehow.

I eagerly waited to buy these until they went on sale. The pattern of the fabric is very lovely. However, they are sized very very small! I weigh about 100 lbs and wear a size 4. I ordered Amazon's recommendation for my size, a Small.  However, the waistband on these shorts was unbelievably tight....elastic is very, very wide and makes waistband very restrictive and uncomforable. I finally had to rip small openings in the band with scissors, and then cut the elastic in about 4 places to relieve some of the restriction. Would not purchase again, even though my solution made them fairly comfortable.
I wasn't sure of the material.  It's sort of like sweat pants but not as heavy. I might need a smaller size, but I don't have a butt to fill them out. Love the color.

I love these shorts and have them in so many colors! They are true to size, comfy, stretchy in all the right ways, lightweight for FL summers, soft and don’t wrinkle!  With the pockets and pleating around the edges they resemble linen shorts but much more comfy material.  My only hang up is the elastic banding that gets twisted eveytime I wear them. It’s annoying but I love these shorts so much it’s not a bother.
Cute pattern, fits well. Comfortable and stretchy.
Looks exactly like the pictures. So soft and comfortable
Good length and comfy!
HOT OUT!!  A pleasant surprise for my aging wife!
So many compliments!

The fabric was A LOT thicker than the picture will have you believe. Not a comfortable summer wear at all. It also has a really weird fit, it bubbles a bit on the front if you don't keep adjusting it. It's not badly made, but it's not what I ordered at all. I returned it, save yourself the time.
These shorts are stretchy and super comfortable. The fabric is a little heavier than I expected but it's not a bad thing.

The photo makes them look more comfortable than they are. The elastic band on the waist is thick which some people might like but I personally don't. The photo makes the material seem flowy amd thin and this is not the case. They are good quality just not the most comfortable for me.
after one or two washes, the elastic band started to crinkle.
Material feels like a sweatshirt not light... the print is screenprinted and overall just cheaply made. So disappointed. Also they run small so size up.

Fabric is nice & sturdy. Cute patterns. But they're just not that comfortable. They pull a bit weirdly. Like others, I have issues with the waistband twisting. size ran small. I had to order again, going up in size.
The material is almost wrinkle free and so soft. Can be dressed up or down.

评论概述: Comfy but more like cheap pajamas & color is off
评论详情: My wardrobe is at least 90% solid colors so I thought these shorts would be a fun way to add a little like to my closet!  I bought a cute red top with puff sleeves and a green top with sheer sleeves to wear with the shorts.  The shorts took longer than usual to receive but wasn't a big deal.  HOWEVER.... I am absolutely 100% ALL for comfy clothes for day, night, work, travel, etc.  But these look very "cheap". The pattern is on the inner and outer of the shorts, so where there is a red leaf on the inside, there is "white" on the outside - this = the red making the white look PINK.  Nothing like the crisp white in the vendor photos.  See attached photos pointed out in blue.As far as fit, they are TTS if not a little big.  And again comfy, but the cheapness and color bleed-through means they can only go in my pajama drawer.
Colors not as bright in person as they are on the site picture.  They’re just ok.
These were perfect for a luau I hosted! The fabric was soft and of medium weight. No color fading after washes. Great value!

This pair of shorts looks terrible. Pilling everywhere. It attracts dog hair and lint like  crazy. Looks like I've been wearing it for years, although I just bought it a few weeks ago. Don't buy this. Buy something better...
I love the material and the print. I just wish they were not so short.
Loved the color and kept me cool in this hot Texas summer the material is thick enough not to see thru.  Will buy more colors! Bought my normal size and it fit great!
Sweat shorts. Not at all what they look like in the photo. Way too heavy for summer apparel.
The material is definitely different but they are cute. I’d say the inseam is short though. Probably 4 inches. With my thick thighs, these were shorter than I wanted. I love the pockets.
These shorts are well made, but the waistband is oddly tight. I have a 27inch waist and bought a medium, and the waistband pinches me. I ended up ripping out the elastic and will try to replace it.
The quality of these shorts took me by surprise!  They are beautiful, soft & stretchy,  and not see-through.  The floral print is stunning!  Will be purchasing more colors.

I typically wear a medium, but I think a large is a better choice for me.  I'm sure it just depends, though. I could get a large and it will be huge.

The drawstring is really really big but when you go to put them on, it doesn’t stay like you need to do another not at the top because you will lose them even if you not them because there’s plenty of space they are actually very comfortable though I do, however, like them I will be buying them another color They are breathable and very comfortable

I bought 2 pair and these are so comfortable and well made. Absolutely love them! I want to get more and got family members to buy some as well. (They love them too)  To help others with their sizing, I carry my weight in my stomach. I bought large and they fit perfectly.
Very soft fabric & fit great! Hope they don’t shrink.

I thought it would be a more thin, summer short, but they were much thicker, like sweats. I still wanted to keep them since they were cute.  I washed them and the elastic waistband shriveled up and folded on itself.  The string also got lost in the waist band.  I figured it might still work so tried to wear them around the house, and it was so uncomfortable and unflattering around my waistline.  I tried to flatten the elastic waistband inside the seams, but it was too cheap to correct. These would be much better if they used a pre shrunk fabric and better quality, or more sturdy, elastic waistband.
I loved the stripes.  they are very comfortable.  I haven’t washed them yet.  Nice weight
The size was too small ( to order) miss sized.the shorts run small. Like 2 sizes

评论概述: Pretty short. NOT like the picture! Too bad. They’re really nice.
评论详情: These are really cute, comfortable, and cool. I don’t mean look cool, I mean temperature cool. But they’re that too. BUT. My only problem is they’re short. Not daisy duke, but if you have ANY thigh rub, up they go. I’m not thin, it’s only the very top thigh. . But I was pick, pick, picking. You all know what I’m talking about. Two inches longer, and I’d buy more of these. They’re so dang cute and comfortable. Maybe they could give different choices. I like these so much I’m actually considering picking out the hem stitching to make them longer. Which is what the models pic looks like. I’d give the real ones a 2” longer inseam. And a folded up finish, which only makes them ride higher.

I needed shorts for casual knock-around use. These are thickish, like French Terry.  I’m 5’6” 140lb and bought Large. I don’t like form-fitting. Haven’t washed yet and hope they don’t shrink. Like the drawstring and soft texture

These are an OK length but a good thing to know is that the material has NO stretch. It has an elastic waistband but the actual material is thin and has no give. I don't love them. They fit, but are not comfortable for activities. For reference, I am 5'9, 230lbs, hourglass figure and ordered an XXL. The waist fits fine and the legs are fine too, but sitting or squatting is uncomfortably tight across the top of my thighs, which is weird. They might be ok if you are built smaller on the bottom half with a bigger waist but they don't work for me. If the material had any give they would be ok.

These are the perfect summer shorts.  I love the colors and style.  You can dress them up with a cute top and sandals 👡 or  wear them with flip flops and a t shirt. This is my second pair of shorts. I will buy many more.

I’m not taking off any stars, because of my personal preference. I ordered the black and they are fine and seem to be well made.  However, they are more of a cotton blend gym/lounge short, which is not what I was looking for. Seems like the solid colors have the higher cotton/more casual look.  I’m returning the black ones and re-ordering in one of the patterns that seem to be less casual and a poly/spandex blend.
Legs roll up as you are wearing the shorts.  Got a bigger size but the length was still the same.

The fabric is a little heavier than I expected, and the elastic waistband twisted all to heck in the first wash. With that being said, these shorts are comfortable. I've washed them several times and there is no hint of fading. Decent buy for the price.

I purchased the black in large, it fit. I liked them enough to then purchased the brown. The large brown fit smaller than the black. Also, the elastic band twists inside the waist when pulling on and off, which becomes annoying.
Fabric pattern is cute, length is good but the elastic in the waist band constantly twists, it should have been sewn so it wouldn’t twist.  So, the finish is not great.
Cute pattern, light weight material. Pilled after first wash. Purchase knowing they won’t last.

评论概述: Cute but the waistband is annying
评论详情: These are cute and comfortable but the waistband keeps twisting. It's a wide piece of elastic so it also folds in half. This makes the shorts less comfortable. I try to fix it but only have moderate success. I don't hate them but I wouldn't buy them again.

评论概述: Cute, but I had to re-sew the waist
评论详情: The material is soft, the floral pattern is super cute… but I literally had to re-sew and reconstruct the waist. They used a wide elastic band that gets all twisted and creates a bunched up look at the waist. Not good. I removed the band (and then removed 10 inches of fabric using darts at different places) and then reinserted just the drawstring. I also had to take in the pockets at the back. All this so the shorts could lay flat and not bunch. Cute pattern, but probably not worth the hassle for most people.
